description:
Wield a variety of weapons to defeat the monsters lurking in the dungeon in this easy-to-play action game.

[Single]
With swords, axes, magic and more at your disposal, how you slay the monsters is up to you!
Complete missions and top the scoreboard!

[Multi]
Playable with 2-4 players!
Work together to exterminate your monster foes!
Kill giant monsters to earn giant bonuses!
Compete with your friends for the highest score!
Battle other players to find out who's really the best!

[Local Multiplayer]
Playable with 2-4 players!
Connect to a shared network and battle it out online!
All scores are hidden from other players, ensuring competition is fierce right up to the last second!
name: Dark Dungeon Warrior
intro:
Become a warrior and fight bravely to defeat the oncoming monsters!
Take on survival battles against other players or work tog
